name: AdjustableBed
0:
”Alexa, turn on the your bed name.”
”Alexa, set the posture on the posture to zero gravity”
”Alexa, turn off light on the your bed name.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With both the “Adjustable Bed” Skill and Alexa, it is possible to verbally interact with our beds. 
To get started, you will need to register using our “SmartBed” App. Subsequently it will be possible to add your personal bed(s). 
Each bed should be given a unique name as it will later be used for identification.
When using the “Adjustable Bed” skill, please call the previously specified name of your bed followed by an action that you would like the bed to carry out.
